summary: Completed testing of CreditoIMO Iteration 10 - UI Improvements. All new features working correctly: 1) Dashboard clickable cards navigating to /processos-filtrados with filters (active, concluded, dropped, pending_deadlines), 2) FilteredProcessList page showing filtered processes in table format, 3) Kanban search with toggle between Kanban and List views, 4) ProcessSummaryCard displaying client summary at top of ProcessDetails page. Tasks system regression test passed.

issues: Fixed: React hydration warning - Badge (div) was nested inside p tag, changed to div with flex layout

passed_tests: Frontend: Login via admin credentials (PASS)
Frontend: Staff Dashboard loads with all stats cards (PASS)
Frontend: Total card visible with 157 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Ativos card visible with 139 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Concluídos card visible with 10 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Desistências card visible with 8 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Prazos Pendentes card visible with 41 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Click Ativos card -> navigates to /processos-filtrados?filter=active (PASS)
Frontend: FilteredProcessList shows 'Processos Ativos' title (PASS)
Frontend: FilteredProcessList shows table with Cliente, Contacto, Fase, Valor, Data Criação, Ações (PASS)
Frontend: Click Concluídos card -> navigates to /processos-filtrados?filter=concluded (PASS)
Frontend: FilteredProcessList shows 'Processos Concluídos' with 10 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Click Desistências card -> navigates to /processos-filtrados?filter=dropped (PASS)
Frontend: FilteredProcessList shows 'Desistências' with 8 processes (PASS)
Frontend: Click Prazos Pendentes card -> navigates to /processos-filtrados?filter=pending_deadlines (PASS)
Frontend: FilteredProcessList shows 'Prazos Pendentes' with Prazo column (PASS)
Frontend: Kanban search input works (PASS)
Frontend: Kanban toggle buttons appear when search has 2+ characters (PASS)
Frontend: Kanban List view shows 'Resultados da Pesquisa' with table (PASS)
Frontend: Kanban List view has Cliente, Contacto, Fase, Valor, Consultor, Intermediário columns (PASS)
Frontend: Toggle back to Kanban view works (PASS)
Frontend: ProcessDetails page loads (PASS)
Frontend: ProcessSummaryCard visible at top of ProcessDetails (PASS)
Frontend: ProcessSummaryCard shows Cliente, Contacto, Imóvel, Financiamento, Equipa, No Sistema (PASS)
Frontend: ProcessSummaryCard has gradient background (PASS)
Frontend: Tasks tab in Admin Dashboard works (PASS)
Frontend: Tasks 'Nova' button works (PASS)
Frontend: Tasks 'Mostrar concluídas' checkbox visible (PASS)
Frontend: Create task dialog opens (PASS)
critical_code_review_comments: FilteredProcessList.js: Well-structured page with filterConfig for different filter types, proper table rendering with status badges
StaffDashboard.js: Clickable cards with goToFilteredList() function, proper navigation to /processos-filtrados with query params
KanbanBoard.js: Search with toggle between Kanban and List views, allFilteredProcesses computed when search has 2+ chars
ProcessSummaryCard.js: Clean component showing client summary with icons, days in system calculation, currency formatting
ProcessDetails.js: ProcessSummaryCard integrated at top, uses process.assigned_consultor_name directly (fixed 'users is not defined' error)
App.js: Route /processos-filtrados properly configured with ProtectedRoute
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 10 features verified: 1) Dashboard clickable cards (Total, Ativos, Concluídos, Desistências, Prazos Pendentes) navigate to /processos-filtrados with appropriate filter query params, 2) FilteredProcessList page shows filtered processes in table format with search functionality, 3) Kanban search with 2+ characters shows toggle buttons for Kanban/List views, List view shows table with Consultor and Intermediário columns, 4) ProcessSummaryCard at top of ProcessDetails shows Cliente, Contacto, Imóvel, Financiamento, Equipa, Dias no Sistema. Fixed minor React hydration warning in StaffDashboard (Badge inside p tag).

features: Dynamic title and description based on filter type
Count badge showing number of filtered processes
Table with Cliente, Contacto, Fase, Valor, Data Criação, Ações
Click row to navigate to process details
Search input filters processes across all columns
Toggle buttons appear when search has 2+ characters
List view (list icon) - table with Consultor and Intermediário columns
Results count badge in list view

tasks_system_regression.note: Tasks tab, Nova button, Mostrar concluídas checkbox all working

react_hydration_warning.issue: Badge (div) nested inside p tag causing React hydration warning
react_hydration_warning.fix: Changed p tag to div with flex layout
